title: Creating a Gmail account - Desktop
description: The following is an example of the interaction flow to create a new Gmail account.

scores.user: pix-think User needs a new gmail account
scores.dialogue: pix-desktop He visits gmail.com on his desktop

scores.system: pix-process system loads a new page

scores.user: pix-face need to fill the form
scores.dialogue: pix-input basic info such as name and username
pix-input  jump to next input with 'TAB'
pix-password guidance to choose an appropriate password
scores.system: pix-update messages appear when clicking on every input

scores.dialogue: pix-message helpful hints support the process
pix-checkbox accept privacy policy and service conditions

scores.system: pix-database system verifies info and saves it

scores.user: pix-intrigued invited to join Google Plus
pix-smiling the account has been created. Yay!
scores.dialogue: pix-page welcome page with basic account info
